name: Lightning Joust
effect: [Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. Then, if the number of cards in your security stack is less than or equal to your opponent's, 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
security_effect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.
